summary.span: 表示使用者啟動、授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

span.span: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同其他型別，才可在完全信任應用程式中使用。As with other types, is only usable in full trust applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用類別The following example shows use of the class [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubsecenv)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubsecenv)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這方法適合搭配已啟用的使用者，例如從傳回的清單中所提供。This method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from . 使用替代方法尚未啟用的使用者。Use the alternate method for users that are not yet activated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來建立安全的環境。The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這方法適用於尚未啟用的新使用者。This method is intended for new users that are not yet activated. 正在啟用新的使用者包括往返伺服器的異動，若要取得使用者憑證和用戶端授權憑證。Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate. 替代方法可以用如果已啟用的使用者，例如從傳回的清單中所提供。The alternate method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來建立安全的環境。The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubsecenv)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubsecenv)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式應該呼叫完成時。The application should call when finished with the . 在後呼叫時，配置給資源記憶體回收行程會回收。After is called, resources allocated to the are reclaimed by the garbage collector. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫之前的最後一個參考發行。Always call before the last reference to the is released. 如果不會呼叫，配置給資源將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫的執行個體之前方法。If is not called, resources allocated to the will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
